summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 FORD F-150. WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS STARTED, THE LOW BRAKE FLUID INDICATOR ILLUMINATED AND THE BRAKES DID NOT HOLD WHEN THE BRAKE PEDAL WAS DEPRESSED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO JONES FORD (833-980-1600, LOCATED AT 5757 RIVERS AVE, NORTH CHARLESTON, SC 29406) AND KEPT FOR DIAGNOSTIC TESTING. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND STATED THAT NOTHING COULD BE DONE UNTIL THE FAILURE WAS DIAGNOSED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 65,000.
